descr: "This resource provides: the claim details; adjudication details from the processing of a Claim; and optionally account balance information, for informing the subscriber of the benefits provided."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a ExplanationOfBenefit resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "The EOB Business Identifier."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of the resource instance."

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "The category of claim, eg, oral, pharmacy, vision, insitutional, professional."

fields.name: subType
fields.descr: "A finer grained suite of claim subtype codes which may convey Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service. In the US the BillType."

fields.name: patient
fields.descr: "Patient Resource."

fields.name: billablePeriod
fields.descr: "The billable period for which charges are being submitted."

fields.name: created
fields.descr: "The date when the EOB was created."

fields.name: enterer
fields.descr: "The person who created the explanation of benefit."

fields.name: insurer
fields.descr: "The insurer which is responsible for the explanation of benefit."

fields.name: provider
fields.descr: "The provider which is responsible for the claim."

fields.name: organization
fields.descr: "The provider which is responsible for the claim."

fields.name: referral
fields.descr: "The referral resource which lists the date, practitioner, reason and other supporting information."

fields.name: facility
fields.descr: "Facility where the services were provided."

fields.name: claim
fields.descr: "The business identifier for the instance: invoice number, claim number, pre-determination or pre-authorization number."

fields.name: claimResponse
fields.descr: "The business identifier for the instance: invoice number, claim number, pre-determination or pre-authorization number."

fields.name: outcome
fields.descr: "Processing outcome errror, partial or complete processing."

fields.name: disposition
fields.descr: "A description of the status of the adjudication."

fields.name: related
fields.descr: "Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior claim versions or for related services."

fields.name: prescription
fields.descr: "Prescription to support the dispensing of Pharmacy or Vision products."

fields.name: originalPrescription
fields.descr: "Original prescription which has been superceded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products. For example, a physician may prescribe a medication which the pharmacy determines is contraindicated, or for which the patient has an intolerance, and therefor issues a new precription for an alternate medication which has the same theraputic intent. The prescription from the pharmacy becomes the 'prescription' and that from the physician becomes the 'original prescription'."

fields.name: payee
fields.descr: "The party to be reimbursed for the services."

fields.name: information
fields.descr: "Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues. Often there are mutiple jurisdiction specific valuesets which are required."

fields.name: careTeam
fields.descr: "The members of the team who provided the overall service as well as their role and whether responsible and qualifications."

fields.name: diagnosis
fields.descr: "Ordered list of patient diagnosis for which care is sought."

fields.name: procedure
fields.descr: "Ordered list of patient procedures performed to support the adjudication."

fields.name: precedence
fields.descr: "Precedence (primary, secondary, etc.)."

fields.name: insurance
fields.descr: "Financial instrument by which payment information for health care."

fields.name: accident
fields.descr: "An accident which resulted in the need for healthcare services."

fields.name: employmentImpacted
fields.descr: "The start and optional end dates of when the patient was precluded from working due to the treatable condition(s)."

fields.name: hospitalization
fields.descr: "The start and optional end dates of when the patient was confined to a treatment center."

fields.name: item
fields.descr: "First tier of goods and services."

fields.name: addItem
fields.descr: "The first tier service adjudications for payor added services."

fields.name: totalCost
fields.descr: "The total cost of the services reported."

fields.name: unallocDeductable
fields.descr: "The amount of deductable applied which was not allocated to any particular service line."

fields.name: totalBenefit
fields.descr: "Total amount of benefit payable (Equal to sum of the Benefit amounts from all detail lines and additions less the Unallocated Deductable)."

fields.name: payment
fields.descr: "Payment details for the claim if the claim has been paid."

fields.name: form
fields.descr: "The form to be used for printing the content."

fields.name: processNote
fields.descr: "Note text."

fields.name: benefitBalance
fields.descr: "Balance by Benefit Category."

fields.name: text
fields.descr:
"A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it \"clinically safe\" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: contained
fields.descr:
"These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope."

fields.name: extension

"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."

"The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes."
